Section2.title: I design, develop, and create optimized applications through good development practices.

Competence.section: Experience in creating and maintaining APIs, landing pages, back office portals, and online stores. In addition to coding, I also monitor application performance and provide system support.

Skills.section: Some technologies I use in my projects.

adidas.description: Complete e-commerce with a wide range of products and fast checkout.

lamborghini.description: Car gallery of the Italian luxury automobile brand.

Services.title: I could help you with...
Services.frontend: I create intuitive interfaces with attention to detail, smooth interactions, and micro-animations that enhance user experience.
Services.backend: I develop back-ends focusing on efficient data management and scalability to support platform growth.
Services.fullstack: I deliver complete solutions combining front and back-end, ensuring high performance, scalability, and an enhanced experience.

adidas.description: Complete e-commerce platform featuring a wide range of products and a fast, intuitive checkout process.

darkBulls.description: Lamborghini car gallery showcasing iconic models and highlighting each car's key features and innovations.

koffie.description: Prototype of a modern, responsive website designed to represent the visual identity of a fictional coffee shop named Koffie.

upWrite.description: Web tool for creating and organizing notes, equipped with advanced text editing features.

solarToy.description: Landing page developed to showcase a mini toy car powered by solar energy, emphasizing its main features.
